Idea
[/vc_column_text][gem_divider margin_top="-14"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Why choosing GemCoin?

[/vc_column_text][gem_divider margin_top="28"][vc_separator color="custom" border_width="2" el_width="10" css_animation="fadeInUp" accent_color="#00c4b8"][gem_divider margin_top="80"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][gem_dropcap shape="circle" style="big" letter="G" color="#ffffff" border_color="#00d2d4"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]
GemCoin is a block chain based marketplace, where buyers and sellers meet to carry out operations involving digital goods and assets with crypto currency transactions. The unique advantage here is an automatic matching of users, basing on straight AI approach.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]
It is a first ever artificial intelligence marketplace in the world, combining traditional and smart contract, block chain, future oriented ideas of connecting people and performing operations by analyzing users preferences. Innovative token design increase system performance up to 1024 times faster.
[/vc_column_text][gem_divider margin_top="94"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1528285922040{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1528285964373{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][gem_fullwidth background_style="cover" background_parallax="1" background_parallax_mobile="1" background_image="{{SRC_ID_48}}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1528288281891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 400px !important;background-image: url(https://codex-themes.com/thegem/sites/onepagers/gem-cryptocoin/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Curved-Background-01-2.png?id=72) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][vc_column_inner][gem_divider margin_top="-80" class_name="vc_hidden-xs"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][gem_divider margin_top="32"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][gem_divider margin_top="-16"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

What is GemCoins?

[/vc_column_text][gem_divider margin_top="28"][vc_separator color="custom" align="align_left" border_width="2" el_width="20" css_animation="fadeInUp" accent_color="#00d2d4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-lg-6"][gem_divider margin_top="17"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]
GemCoins are tokens, based on the Ethereum blockchain technology. It is the core asset of the new GemCoin Marketplace. Users possessing GemCoins can exchange them for buying digital goods on the marketplace.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][gem_image position="centered" disable_lightbox="1" src="{{SRC_ID_675}}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][gem_image position="centered" disable_lightbox="1" src="{{SRC_ID_691}}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-xs"][gem_image position="centered" disable_lightbox="1" src="{{SRC_ID_692}}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm"][gem_image position="centered" disable_lightbox="1" src="{{SRC_ID_693}}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-lg-6"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Main Features

[/vc_column_text][gem_divider margin_top="80"][gem_list]

  • No transaction fees. Sellers enjoy 100% earnings
  • Instant operations without any centralized system
  • Protects the identity basing on AI
